name: Box of Silirrion Scones
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ Note: While only title 7 traders can make these, any title level 6+ character can use them. It will give the user a boost to their health. #L "Sealed Container of Foodstuffs" "258581" #L "Multi-Form" "156345" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Sealed Container of Foodstuffs + Right Click = #L "Sealed Container of Foodstuffs Awaiting Credentials" "25895" Sealed Container of Foodstuffs Awaiting Credentials + Multi-Form = #L "Box of Silirrion Scones" "258582" Note: Sometimes right clicking the container will result in a: #L "Cease and Desist Order" "258601" This item is used for the #L "Trader Pet Mission" "/tell recipe XXX" ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Eating one of Scones will lock your Pharma Tech skill for 1800 seconds, but more importantly it will also boost your Health: +1000 Health for 3 min +800 Health for next 3 min +600 Health for next 3 min +400 Health for next 3 min +200 Health for last 3 min
